home.thankYouText: We’ve received your order for today!
home.hurryUpText: Hurry up and place your order!
home.giveCode: Give this code to the delivery driver to receive your order
home.capacityLimitReached: Sorry, we’re at capacity and can’t take new orders right now

catalogue.title: Catalogue
catalogue.noProduceMessage: No produce available, check back soon!

editProfile.title: Edit profile
editProfile.passwordResetSuccess: A password reset link was sent to your email
editProfile.passwordResetError: Failed to send password reset email. Please try again

profile.verifyEmailBanner: Verify your email to place orders
profile.title: Profile

orderHistory.title: My orders
orderHistory.noOrdersDescription: Once you place an order, you'll be able to see it here

customerSupport.title: Email support
customerSupport.description: Please let us know if you have any requests or issues with your order
customerSupport.successDescription: Your email was successfully sent. We will get back to you as soon as possible
customerSupport.errorDescription: Failed to send email. Please try again at a later time

order.title: Basket
order.emptyDescription: Add some fresh fruits and vegetables to your cart to get started
order.proceedToCheckoutErrorDescription: Your basket must contain {{maxOrderQuantity}} kg before you can checkout

signUp.title: Sign Up
signUp.confirmAddressMessage: Ensure you're at home during registration. Your location will be captured automatically
signUp.enterProfileMessage: Last step! Please enter your email and password
signUp.agreementCheckbox: I agree to the Privacy Policy and Terms of Service
signUp.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters
signUp.passwordPattern: Password must contain a number and a symbol
signUp.passwordUpperCase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
signUp.firstNameMinLength: First name must be at least 3 characters long
signUp.firstNameMaxLength: First name must be at most 30 characters long
signUp.lastNameMinLength: Last name must be at least 3 characters long
signUp.lastNameMaxLength: Last name must be at most 30 characters long
signUp.blocMaxLength: Bloc must be at most 6 characters
signUp.blocPattern: Bloc must contain only alphanumeric characters
signUp.neighborhoodMinLength: Neighborhood must be at least 3 characters
signUp.neighborhoodMaxLength: Neighborhood must be at most 30 characters
signUp.communeMinLength: Commune must be at least 3 characters
signUp.communeMaxLength: Commune must be at most 30 characters
signUp.provinceMinLength: Wilaya must be at least 3 characters
signUp.provinceMaxLength: Wilaya must be at most 30 characters
signUp.postalCodePattern: Postal code must be exactly 5 digits
signUp.apartmentRequired: Apartment is required. Enter 0 if not applicable
signUp.apartmentMaxLength: Apartment must be at most 6 characters
signUp.apartmentPattern: Apartment must contain only alphanumeric characters
signUp.agreementError: Please agree to the Privacy Policy and Terms of Service to proceed
signUp.errorMessage: An error occurred. Please try again later

forgotPassword.title: Forgot password
forgotPassword.enterEmailMessage: Enter your email to receive a link to reset your password
forgotPassword.successDescription: If an account exists for {{email}}, a password reset link has been sent
forgotPassword.errorDescription: Failed to send password reset email. Please try again

checkout.digitalPaymentMessage: Payment will be requested once your order is packed

helpUsImprove.title: Suggestions?
helpUsImprove.description: We'd love to hear from you! Share your thoughts, ideas, or suggestions with us to help improve your experience. Thank you!
helpUsImprove.successDescription: Your suggestions were received. Thank you
helpUsImprove.errorDescription: Failed to send email. Please try again at a later time

unsupportedRegion.title: Coming soon...
unsupportedRegion.description: We're expanding! Subscribe to our newsletter to know when we reach your area!
unsupportedRegion.errorMessage: Something went wrong. Please try again

unsupportedCountry.title: Unsupported Country
unsupportedCountry.description: Sorry, your country is not supported

orderSuccessful.digitalPaymentMessage: Payment due when order is packed

cancellationReasons.clientRequest: by admin because client requested cancellation
cancellationReasons.clientDidNotAnswer: by admin because client did not answer

onBoarding.description1: Welcome to your personal companion app for fresh fruit and vegetable deliveries right to your doorstep!
onBoarding.subTitle1: Please choose a language to get started
onBoarding.description2: Customize your basket with our seasonal variety of fruits and vegetables
onBoarding.title3: Delivered fresh, straight to your doorstep
onBoarding.description3: Orders placed before 6 pm will be delivered within the next two hours. Otherwise, they’ll be delivered the next day
onBoarding.detail3: You can place one order per day

verifyOtp.title: Verify account
verifyOtp.enterCodePrompt: Please enter the code sent to your email to complete your account setup
verifyOtp.resendPrompt: Did not receive the code? Resend
verifyOtp.resendPromptWithTime: Didn't receive the code? You can resend in {{seconds}} seconds
verifyOtp.errorMessage: You have entered an invalid code. Please try again
verifyOtp.sendEmailMessage: A new code has been sent to your email
verifyOtp.sendErrorMessage: Failed to send a new code. Please try again at a later time

inventory.title: Inventory
inventory.reportSuccess: Inventory report for {{date}} has been emailed to {{email}}
inventory.reportError: Failed to generate report for {{date}}. Please try again

adminOrderDetails.title: Order n°{{orderId}}
adminOrderDetails.name: Name
adminOrderDetails.enterDeliveryCode: Enter the 4-digit code to complete the delivery

exceptions.dailyCancellationLimitReached: Sorry, you have reached the daily cancellation limit of three orders. Please try again tomorrow to place a new order
exceptions.oneOrderPerDay: Only one order per day is permitted. Be sure to come back tomorrow to secure your basket early!
exceptions.cancelOrderTimeout: Unable to cancel order. Contact support if you wish to cancel
exceptions.forgotPasswordRequestCooldown: Please wait before requesting a new code
exceptions.capacityLimitReached: Sorry, we’ve reached our capacity for today and are unable to take new orders. Please try placing your order again tomorrow
exceptions.cancelOrderMidnight: Order cannot be cancelled after the allowed time
exceptions.orderingDisabled: Ordering is currently unavailable. We'll be back soon!
exceptions.digitalPaymentFailed: Payment couldn’t be completed. Try again or choose another payment option

cancelOrderModal.title: Are you sure you want to cancel this order?

deleteAccountModal.title: Are you sure you want to delete your account? Deleting your account will not cancel any active orders you have. Please contact us if you wish to cancel your orders

permissionModal.locationPermissionDescription: This app requires location access to function properly. Please enable location permissions in your device settings

gpsRequiredModal.locationServicesDescription: Your location services (GPS) are currently disabled. Please enable them in your device settings to continue

deliveryCreditModal.deliveryDiscountDescription: Starting from 2000 DZD, for every 1000 DZD spent on your order, we cover 100 DZD
deliveryCreditModal.deliveryFeeDescription: Delivery fees are determined based on the distance from the customer’s address to our store

paymentProcessing.title: Complete your payment
paymentProcessing.paymentTimeoutMessage: Your payment session expired. Please try again
paymentProcessing.paymentFailedMessage: Payment couldn’t be completed. Try again or choose another payment option

deliveryScreen.permissionMessage: Location permission is needed to start the delivery. Please enable location services in your device settings.

adminOrders.emptyState: No orders placed on this date
